String.string: Put the {@creature:46#202#argonomorph kulkari shamans} out of their probable misery.
I don't even want to think about why the argons created {@creature:46#202#argonomorph kulkari shamans}.
Kill the {@creature:46#202#argonomorph kulkari shamans} guarding the rooms in the {@Rgn:46002$$Raga Evala} part of {@Rgn:46001$$the Three Towers}.
Return to the {@Rgn:46020$$Shineroot Chamber} and report to {@creature:246#1024$$Platanok}.
